intro.about_text: Computer Engineering student with a strong interest in cybersecurity, networking, and low-level programming. This is my personal space where I share technical projects and learning experiences.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.http_server: Low-level HTTP server implemented in C using sockets. Supports GET, POST, and OPTIONS requests without external libraries.
projects.films_api: Python API for managing films, shopping carts and clients. Built with SQLAlchemy, PostgreSQL, and Docker.
projects.library_api: Two microservices written in Python using Quart. Implements custom token-based authentication and file management.
projects.libpcap: ARP packet capture, analysis, and response tool built with Python and libpcap. Tested in Mininet and well-documented.
